Articles.Content:
I don\'t know if this post belongs here but do any one you know what the new tracking station does in the new pre-paid update?

Jeb\'s righthand man

I don\'t know if this post belongs here but do any one you know what the new tracking station does in the new pre-paid update?

It lets you go back to persistent ships easily, and see the map.
so if i land a ship on the mun and want to build another rocket and wait for it to launch off the moon i can build while its still there?
Yes. Instead of ending the flight though, you need to return to the space center. It\'s the new pause menu option.
